channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Case of the Special Edition
item.author: A Dixon Hawke Mystery
item.description: John Meadowes, who had been ignominiously fired from his job, let his already bullied, over-worked, and nerve-ridden mind plot revenge on the man who ruined his life. Now, can Dixon Hawke find the evidence that puts Meadowes at the scene of the murder? Or will Meadowes escape to join the army and die gloriously in the coming war?
